name: supernutrition
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process of taking in and using too much food : In developed countries of the West, the problem is not sub-nutrition but super-nutrition. Because of smoking, stress and supernutrition, problems with blood circulation have increased dramatically.
More examplesFewer examplesObesity and insufficient exercise caused by super-nutrition are causing problems in our health service.Liver damage can be caused by various things, such as viral infections, super-nutrition, or genetic diseases. Certain problems in our organs occur as a consequence of supernutrition.
